posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i159.photobucket.com/albums/t160/drwarf/dahlenT206Brooklyn.jpg[/IMG]

Email is [url]drwarf@att.net[/url] This card was in a PSA 4 holder, but removed because I was going to send it in to BVG due to my preference in the holder. This card was graded so should be able to be regraded for your choice. I am asking $575 delivered, but will also take offers. It is a Piedmont 350 back. Thanks.
